1.content: Download and replace NPC Therapy images from GitHub
1.details: 1. Download therapy_office images from https://github.com/12Matt3r/Npctherapy/tree/master/imgs/therapy_office. 2. Download character_habitats images from https://github.com/12Matt3r/Npctherapy/tree/master/imgs/character_habitats. 3. Replace existing images in workspace. 4. Clean up all other image files outside these folders.

2.details: 1. Initialize git repository. 2. Create proper README.md with image descriptions. 3. Set up directory structure for images. 4. Add .gitignore if needed.

3.details: 1. Add all image files to git. 2. Commit with descriptive messages. 3. Push to GitHub (user will provide repo URL or I'll create one). 4. Verify all images are properly uploaded.
